Quick Start

Note that API keys are hidden. Please get your own API keys.

This quick start example is also available in Jupyter Notebook format.

Import Scopus class and initialize with your own API Key

General Search

Search for a specific author

1     University of Iowa           60024324  57077574400               1   
2     University of Iowa           60024324  57192277492               1   
3     University of Iowa           60024324  57192307067               1   
4  Iowa State University  60004354 60001439  56995506800               1   

        name

1  Kang Zhao  
2  Kang Zhao  
3  Kang Zhao  
4  Kang Zhao

Then we can retrieve more detailed info about the author we are looking for using his/her author_id:

Abstract retrieval

Note that Searching for articles in specific journals (venues) is not supported anymore since this can be easily done by general search

Citation count retrieval

Note that the use of citation overview API needs to be approved by Elsevier.
